targets.expr: sum ((sum by (job, area) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="heap"}) / sum by (job, area) (jvm_memory_max_bytes{area="heap"})) * 100) by (job)

sum by (job, method, status, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{service=~"$service", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{service=~"$service", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m]))
